content: introducing AI people a generative AI sandbox that enables players to experience interactions with autonomous NPCs through text or voice input there are no fixed plots NPC's choices and emotions craft emerging stories they adapt to players the environment and fellow NPCs while maintaining consistency through long-term memory Unleash Your creativity with the integrated editor shaping NPC's lives and crafting unlimited narratives or enjoy pre-made and community-made stories driven by Ai and user content each game session is a fresh original constantly evolving narrative Journey the players can choose between online and local large language models to power the NPCs what story will you create today
title: AI People | Autonomous NPC Interactions
author: NVIDIA GeForce

key_facts: AI People is a generative AI sandbox for interactive storytelling.
Players interact with autonomous NPCs using text or voice input.
NPCs have dynamic choices, emotions, and long-term memory.
Stories emerge from NPC interactions and environmental changes.
The system supports both online and local large language models.
Users can create custom narratives via an integrated editor.
Pre-made and community-created stories are available.
Each game session generates a unique, evolving narrative.
NPCs adapt to players, environment, and other NPCs.
The platform enables persistent story continuity through memory.
key_opinions: The AI-driven narrative system offers unmatched creative freedom.
Autonomous NPCs make the experience feel more lifelike and engaging.
The integrated editor empowers users to shape complex character arcs.
Community content enriches the storytelling ecosystem.
Local LLMs provide better privacy and control over gameplay.
Emergent storytelling surpasses traditional scripted games.
Voice input enhances immersion in player-NPC interactions.
Long-term memory ensures consistent character development.
The sandbox model encourages experimentation and replayability.
This approach redefines how players engage with digital narratives.
key_datapoints: NPCs maintain consistency through long-term memory.
Supports both online and local large language models.
Users can create unlimited narratives via the integrated editor.
Community-made stories are actively contributed and shared.
Each session generates a fresh, original narrative.
Interactions occur via text or voice input.
Stories evolve dynamically based on player actions.
No fixed plots or predetermined outcomes exist.
Narratives adapt to environment and fellow NPCs.
Player choice drives story direction in real time.
